prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Bass, Guitar, Drums, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Guitar, Bass, Drums - no Organ in this song.

Style 2: This song features Reed, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, but no Organ.

Style 3: No Organ in this piece, but it does include Reed, Guitar, Bass, and Drums.
